column4: has a load of broken updates been pushed to the repository?  i'm getting stuff like "libssl-dev: Depends: libssl0.9.8 (= 0.9.8g-15ubuntu3) but 0.9.8g-15ubuntu3.2 is installed."
i've run apt-get update, and that hasn't helped...
do you have the updates repository enabled?
gah, how the hell did that get disabled? :| thanks!
